title: Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement

Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

basic_info.name: Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College Highlights
description: Following are some of the top features and highlights of Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College, which makes it a favorite among present students and future Engineers.

basic_info.name: Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College Courses
description: The Andhra Pradesh based Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College offers an extensive range of and employment oriented Graduate, Postgraduate and Doctorate courses including B.Tech, M.Tech and PhD in numerous specializations. Given below are the details of the same.

basic_info.name: Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College Admission
description: The admission process at Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College takes place in online mode and aspiring candidates have to fulfill multiple steps as defined below. Also, for any admission related queries or issues, they can reach out to 08816-224516, 229377, +91 9848823332 or can even drop a mail at PRINCIPAL@SRKREC.AC.IN.

Apart from this, seats of each course have been divided among two categories including Category A and Category B. In other words, 70% seats of B.Tech and M.Tech are kept reserved for students having a valid score in AP EAPCET or AP PGECET and 30% seats are kept reserved for Cat-B NRI seats and Cat-B non-NRI seats.
How to Apply?

basic_info.name: Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College Campus Life and Facilities
description: The Andhra Pradesh based Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College is situated in a very vibrant, positive and spacious campus of 30 acres of green land. Also, the college has a very conducive, inclusive, culturally responsive and collaborative teaching-learning environment for both teachers and students so that best quality education can be delivered by faculty members and students can fully grasp the delivered concepts. Alongside education and research, a history of work ethos that supports students in developing a creative, confident and logical approach to nation building has been established by the SRKREC.

In addition to this, with 42 years of collaborative efforts, the institution constantly strives to promote the next generation Engineers, Industrialists, Entrepreneurs, Researchers, Academicians and Leaders and cited below are the details of world-class infrastructure which college has developed over the years.

Smart Classrooms and Laboratories: As we all know that hi-tech classrooms and modern laboratories are prime pillars of academic excellence for an educational institution. Hence the SRKREC has developed independent buildings for each department and each building in return has amazing, spacious and well-ventilated classrooms, where all kinds of latest technologies and audio-video devices are present. Then there are staff rooms, waiting halls and wi-fi facilities. This kind of setup gives a perfect ambiance to everyone whether studying or teaching.

Auditorium and Seminar Halls: There is also a sophisticated and incredible Auditorium and Seminar Halls in college and this space is primarily used by the SRKREC to conduct guest lectures, symposiums, conferences, webinars along with industry-interaction sessions on a regular basis.
Apart from this, both seminar halls as well as auditoriums are fully air-conditioned and have everything including audio-video aids and public address systems.
Technology Center: For the purpose of encouraging and fostering a culture of innovation, technology and Entrepreneurship, a dedicated Technology Center has been established by the college in 2015.

And this center is used to conduct skill development programs and workshops on latest technologies. Apart from this, students from all Engineering disciplines work here on some amazing research projects and a dedicated Computer Lab along with all necessary facilities are available over here.

Digital Learning Center: With the objective to promote self learning capabilities and techniques among students and faculty members, the SRKR Engineering College has set up a fully-fledged Digital Learning Center on campus and this well-resourced space has all kinds of basic and advanced amenities along with 200 computer systems having the latest configurations.

And students can leverage the the benefits of all kinds of online learning resources and platforms including MOOC, Swayam and NPTEL Courses followed by IITBombay - Spoken Tutorials online Lectures and National & International Journals such as IEEE, Elsevier and ACM etc.

Computer Center: There is also a Computer Center on the college campus and it has primarily been developed with the aim to improve the overall learning experiences of students, faculty and staff members and assist them in their regular academic and research activities.

Another objective of this center is to offer automation support to the college for routine activities like administration, research, courses and assignments. In addition to this, this center has state-of-the-art computing facilities to complement classroom pedagogy, 5 servers and 200 nodes connected by switches and Cat 5e cabling with a passable pack of system and application software.

Centre for Foreign Languages: We all are living in a very dynamic, competitive and unpredictable world, and for aspiring students and future leaders, itâ€™s very essential for educational institutions to learn foreign languages. Hence the Andhra Pradesh based college has established a very sophisticated Center for Foreign Languages, so that students can learn multiple foreign languages and gain better career opportunities.

Online training for German, Spanish and French language is provided to students here and the training mainly covers all the four-fold skills of language, i.e. listening, speaking, reading and writing. A few more languages like Japanese and Korean will also be available soon.

Language Nest (Literary Club): An independent, self-financed and students-driven club has been established by the institution in order to organize activities related to language and literacy from time to time under the supervision of an Advisory Committee, lay the foundation of SRKR TED Talks and inculcate leadership as well as organizational skills in young and ambitious students of the society.

The club is managed and administered by an elected student body consisting of only first year member-students. All the events are open for the students of all years and their participation and performance is recognized with certificates and/or prize money.

Library: For the purpose of providing additional learning sources to students, faculties and staff members and help them in research and project works, the institution has set up a modern and spacious Library on campus, which is situated on a huge area of 4160 sqm. of land. And this library hosts a very rich and diverse collection of 29850 titles and 108073 volumes, more than 675 e-journals and 102 print journals.

Apart from this, facilities like book banks, scanning facilities and e-learning arrangements are available here. Along with this, a separate reading room is present here and the library remains open from 9 AM to 11 PM. All the library operations have been computerized.

Robust Sports Infrastructure: There is no doubt in the fact that good health is the real wealth of life, hence to make students physically fit and mentally healthy, disciplines and inculcate in them the spirit of true sportsman, enough sports arrangements have been developed on campus.

And students primarily enjoy a broad range of indoor and outdoor sports facilities here such as Cricket, Volleyball, Ball Badminton, Kho-Kho, BasketBall, Tennis Archery, HandBall, FootBall, Hockey, Shuttle Badminton, Rope Climbing, Horizontal and Parallel Bar followed by Table Tennis, Caroms, Chess and Gymnasium facilities like Weight lifting sets, indoor Badminton, dumbbells and Bench press etc.

Cafeteria: An aesthetically developed and big canteen has been set up by the college for the purpose of serving delicious food items, breakfast and snacks to students and staff members at an affordable price. Also, this place is used by students to chit-chat with their peers, relax and rejuvenate after their classes.
Read More: SRKREC Faculty

basic_info.name: Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College Placement
description: Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College has concluded the placements for 2023 and report has been released. As per the official report the highest offer of INR 29.5 LPA is made by Morgan Stanley for the post of Technology Analyst. A total of 1866 offers made to 1023 students. Among all, 358 offers were made by TCS Ninja, followed by Sify which made 47 offers in the SRKREC Placements 2023. Read More: SRKREC Placement

faqs.question: What is the intake capacity and per-year fees of B.Tech and M.Tech courses offered by the Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Following are the annual fees details and intake capacity of B.Tech and M.Tech courses offered by the Andhra Pradesh based Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College.CoursesIntake CapacityPer-Year FeesB.TechComputer Science and Business System, Computer Science and Design and Computer Science and Information Technology - 60Computer Science and Engineering - 300Electronics and Communication Engineering - 240Internet of Things and Cyber Security including BlockChain Technology, Electrical and Electronics Engineering - 120Other Specializations - 180INR 77,000M.TechStructural Engineering, Computer Science and Technology - 12Other Specializations - 6INR 54,000

faqs.question: Which statutory and non-statutory committees are present in the Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Following committees are present on the campus of Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College.Statutory Committees:Governing Body, Academic Council, Board of Studies, Finance CommitteeNon-Statutory Committee:Planning and Evaluation Committee, Grievance Redressal Committee, Examination Committee, Admission Committee, Library Committee, Student Welfare Committee, Anti-Sexual Harassment/Internal Complaints Committee, Women Grievance Redressal Committee, Extra-Curricular Activities Committee, Academic Audit Committee

faqs.question: Does Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College offer accommodation facilities to students?
faqs.answer: With the aim to offer a home-like safe and comfortable environment to students away from their home, the Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College provides separate hostel facilities to both girls and boys with an accommodation capacity of 800 and 400 students respectively. Also, these hostels are well-resourced with facilities like clean, spacious and ventilated rooms with Vitrified flooring, attached toilet facility with round the clock water supply, R.O. water supply for drinking, Reading room with TV, Indoor games facility, Solar Hot water, Well equipped dining hall, Hygienic Mess facility, 24 hours Power backup, WI-FI Internet facility, Round the clock communication facility with parents on demand and observing every day study hour during 9 PM to 11 PM.

Section.name: About SRKR
Section.description:
Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College is an Andhra Pradesh based distinguished and self-financed Private (Autonomous) Engineering institution, founded in 1980. The college offers NBA approved 12 Undergraduate, 6 Postgraduate and 7 Doctorate programs in the discipline of Engineering and Technology. The college is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU) of Kakinada, approved by AICTE, UGC and accredited by NAAC with grade A.
SRKREC is also recognized as a Scientific and Industrial Research Organization by the Ministry of Science and Technology - Government of India and certified as Quality Management System under the standards of ISO 9001:2015. Admission to institute courses is granted to students based on their merit in preceding year qualifying exam and score of AP EAPCET, GATE or AP PGECET entrance exams.
The institution also has state-of-the-art facilities and ultra-modern infrastructure such as smart classrooms, hostel, auditorium, cafeteria, library, computer labs and medical arrangements, digital learning center and language and literacy clubs etc. Highly educated and experienced faculty members teach at college and SRKREC strength primarily lies in its 43 years of academic excellence, 30k+ world class graduates, 22 Cr projects which are being funded by By DST, AICTE, UGC & Foreign Universities, 64+ collaborations, 17 Center of Excellence, 16 start-ups on which students and faculties are working together dedicatedly.
Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College has concluded the placements for 2023 and report has been released. As per the official report the highest offer of INR 29.5 LPA is made by Morgan Stanley for the post of Technology Analyst. A total of 1866 offers made to 1023 students. Among all, 358 offers were made by TCS Ninja, followed by Sify which made 47 offers in the SRKREC Placements 2023.

Ques. What is the intake capacity and per-year fees of B.Tech and M.Tech courses offered by the Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College?
Ans. Following are the annual fees details and intake capacity of B.Tech and M.Tech courses offered by the Andhra Pradesh based Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College.
Ques. Which statutory and non-statutory committees are present in the Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College?
Ans. Following committees are present on the campus of Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College.
Statutory Committees: Governing Body, Academic Council, Board of Studies, Finance Committee
Non-Statutory Committee: Planning and Evaluation Committee, Grievance Redressal Committee, Examination Committee, Admission Committee, Library Committee, Student Welfare Committee, Anti-Sexual Harassment/Internal Complaints Committee, Women Grievance Redressal Committee, Extra-Curricular Activities Committee, Academic Audit Committee
Ques. Does Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College offer accommodation facilities to students?
Ans. With the aim to offer a home-like safe and comfortable environment to students away from their home, the Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College provides separate hostel facilities to both girls and boys with an accommodation capacity of 800 and 400 students respectively. Also, these hostels are well-resourced with facilities like clean, spacious and ventilated rooms with Vitrified flooring, attached toilet facility with round the clock water supply, R.O. water supply for drinking, Reading room with TV, Indoor games facility, Solar Hot water, Well equipped dining hall, Hygienic Mess facility, 24 hours Power backup, WI-FI Internet facility, Round the clock communication facility with parents on demand and observing every day study hour during 9 PM to 11 PM.

Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering Colle.Eligibility Criteria:
10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as a compulsory subject and Chemistry, Biotechnology, English and Biology as the optional subjects from the CBSE or from any other equivalent recognised board.
Valid non-zero score in AP EAPCET or EAMCET entrance exam.

Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering Colle.SpecializationS: Computer Science & Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, Computer Science and Design, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Computer Science and Business Systems, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, Internet of Things & Cyber Security Including Blockchain Technology
Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering Colle.Eligibility Criteria: Diploma or any other equivalent qualification from a recognized university or college

Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering Colle.SpecializationS: CAD/CAM, Communication Systems, Computer Science & Technology, Information Technology, Power System & Automation, Structural Engineering
Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering Colle.Eligibility Criteria:
BE/B.Tech Degree in any relevant stream of Science or Engineering from a recognized university or college
Valid marks in GATE or AP PGECET

Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering Colle.SpecializationS: Civil Engineering, Electrical And Electronics Engineering, Electronics And Communications Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, Chemistry
